name: trackiellm
description: Manifest file for TrackieLLM's C++ dependencies.

dependencies.name: onnxruntime
dependencies.description: Cross-platform inference and training machine-learning accelerator. Used for YOLO and MiDaS models.

dependencies.name: tesseract
dependencies.description: High-quality OCR engine. Used for text recognition.

dependencies.name: llama-cpp
dependencies.description: Inference of LLaMA model in pure C/C++. Used for the Mistral-7B core LLM.

dependencies.name: whisper-cpp
dependencies.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper model in C/C++. Used for ASR.

dependencies.name: miniaudio
dependencies.description: Single-file audio playback and capture library. Used for microphone input and speaker output.

dependencies.name: gtest
dependencies.description: Google Test framework for C++ unit testing.

dependencies.name: benchmark
dependencies.description: Google Benchmark library for C++ microbenchmarking.

cuda.description: Enables CUDA support in dependencies for NVIDIA GPU acceleration.

rocm.description: Enables ROCm support in dependencies for AMD GPU acceleration.
